document.full_text: after acting as a voice of moderation between sunnis and shiites in the past two months of upheaval, the editor of a progressive bahraini newspaper was forced out of his job.
document.title: the saturday profile: editor silenced, with the help of unreliable sources
lines_and_colors: after acting as a voice of moderation between sunnis and shiites in the past two months of upheaval, the editor of a progressive bahraini newspaper was forced out of his job.
